description.description: The description of the execution plan.

name.description: The name of the execution plan.

stack_id.description: The ID of the resource stack to which the execution plan belongs.

stack_name.description: The name of the resource stack to which the execution plan belongs.

template_body.description: The HCL/JSON template content for deployment resources.

template_uri.description: The OBS address where the HCL/JSON template archive (**.zip** file, which contains all resource **.tf.json** script files to be deployed) or **.tf.json** file is located, which describes the target status of the deployment resources.

vars_body.description: The variable content for deployment resources.

vars_uri.description: The OBS address where the variable (**.tfvars**) file corresponding to the HCL/JSON template located, which describes the target status of the deployment resources.
